entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "playsinline" attribute not working in HTML5 video tag for iOS #16013
  • NU1202 Package Microsoft.Maui.Graphics 7.0.86 is not compatible with net7.0-android #16009
    Backlog
  • [ VS & .NET 8 ] MAUI Android/iOS causes error and can't be built, .csproj file can't be shown #16008
    Backlog
  • Align text displays differently on Windows Machine and Android #16006
    Backlog
  • Android Overview Page and the iOS App Switcher page icon problem maui #16005
  • iOS Frame/Carousel/Image does not work on iOS #16003
  • In maui, when using stepper to combine Entry and Editor, clicking the + sign does not respond and the value does not change #16002
  • Crashes in apps built with visual studio 17.6.* #16001
    .NET 8
  • "Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Page' to type 'Microsoft.Maui.IContentView'." #16000
  • XamlC error XFC0000 prevents launch #15999
  • Android app crash in release Mode #15997
  • [MAUI] RefreshView details page does not load images. #15994
  • [MAUI]Text appears overlapping on RefreshView page. #15993
  • [MAUI] Refresh does not work on RefreshView page. #15992
  • FlexLayout Padding not working #15991
  • Content Page Can Not Extend Edge To Fullscreen When Using Translucent NavigationBar #15989

Closed

  • Showing TitleBar and ToolbarItems on Android in a modal ContentPage in a MVVM Shell app #15498
    .NET 8
  • [MAUI] After rotating the Emulator/Simulator to horizontal orientation, the text in the picture disappears and the button is truncated. #15589
    .NET 8
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8333] [MAUI] New Recipe page layout is abnormal in Simulator/Emulator(API -33) landscape mode #15521
  • System fonts such as ".SFUI-Semibold" are not applied on iOS #15882
    Backlog
  • MAUI DatePicker: Event "DateSelected" only triggered when date changes #16007
  • Navigating between the ShellContent tabs by swiping right-left #16011
  • File access from android app to windows server #16004
  • Fix Legacy Control Gallery so it's an equally runnable state that it was for Xamarin.Forms #11235
    .NET 8
  • The EvenOdd FillRule failed in the wraping space #15431
  • Publish exe - console show wrong outout #15742
  • while downloading Android emulator , "The operation has timed out." is showing. #15372
  • Unable to create new empty project MAUI #14953
  • Visual Studio Mac 17.5.3 (build 15) doesn't list Maui Templates #14352
  • .net maui ios ipa cant be created #14393
  • Error on Visual Studio Mac (Latest Version) #15181
  • Assets file doesn't have a target for net7.0 #14175
  • download error #14356
  • Can't find Apple SDK Location despite correct SDK path #14582
  • I can not see MAUI project type in VS 2022 #13099
  • .NET MAUI cant show up on the list of project #13748
  • Can not run the app #13203
  • [MAUI]: AndroidX and Android Support Library Compile time issues #15996
  • Blazor Hybrid Webview crash the Application Android #15874
  • Missing horizontal scrollbar in `ScrollView` #15953

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #15988
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Streamline ModalNavigation lifecycle events #15799
    area/navigation 🧭, area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.2.0 #15987
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [android] improve performance of `Entry.MaxLength` #15614
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [tests] make Windows memory leak tests consistent #15998
    area/testing
  • Fix ".SFUI" magic font string on iOS/MacCatalyst #15990
    t/bug, area/fonts 🅰️

Updated

  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Reflect default value of IsClippedToBounds property #15894
    community ✨
  • [X] avoid AmbiguousMatchException #15873
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Fix Editor placeholder issues #15883
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, i/regression
  • Include headers/footers in EmptySource count so they show up when ItemsSource is null #15979
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Fix Graphics Font comparison method #15985
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • Start docs for UITesting #15836
    area/testing
  • Android: recreate activity on dark mode change #15449
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/theme
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Colors are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • Use Frame command to recalc span bounds #15168
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add GotoAsync overload for single use query parameters #15585
    area/shell 🐢
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Move some controls to use ModifyMapping #15058
  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu
  • Add 'TranslateXTo' and 'TranslateYTo' to 'ViewExtensions'. #15906
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15748
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [iOS] Fix ScrollTo method issues #15984
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, layout-scrollview
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix issue setting ContentPage gradient background #15832
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Fix CollectionView broken test #15584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
